item.title: Linux Bug
item.description: timeout in locking authority file /home/***/.Xauthority rm -fr .Xauthority-* E: Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (11 Resource temporarily unavailable) E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/) is another process using it sudo rm /var/cache/apt/archives/lock sudo rm /var/lib/dpkg/lock sudo rm /var/lib/apt/lists/lock
